attributes.action: Make it easier for council's to prosicute noisy neighbours, for dog barking, loud music, and general unsocial behavior
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I beleive it's about time the government made it easier for local authorities to prosicute noisy neighbours, for allowing insesant unresticted dog barking, loud music into the small hours, and general antisocial behavior.

At presant if you contact the noise abatment officer he has no powers to challange or stop these people, this should be changed so decent law abiding people can live in peace, without this constant antisocial element.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
False or incomplete name or address information
